mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club_user_list (user_id, club_id, role) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{club_id}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT cul.user_id, cul.club_id, cul.role, c.id, c.name, u.id, u.name, u.username FROM CLUB_USER_LIST cul JOIN CLUB c ON cul.club_id = c.id JOIN USER u ON cul.user_id = u.id WHERE club_id = #{club_id}

SELECT cul.user_id "cs_uid", cul.club_id "cs_cid", cul.role "cs_role", c.id "c_id", c.name "c_name", c.representative_picture "c_representative_picture" FROM CLUB_USER_LIST cul JOIN CLUB c ON cul.club_id = c.id WHERE cul.user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM club_user_list WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND club_id = #{club_id}
mapper.select: SELECT cs.user_id "cs_uid", cs.club_id "cs_cid", cs.role "cs_role", cs.regdate "cs_regdate", u.id "u_id", u.name "u_name", u.tel "u_tel", u.username "u_username", u.password "u_password", u.address "u_address", u.gender "u_gender", u.birthday "u_birthday", u.profile_picture "u_profile_picture", u.regdate "u_regdate" FROM club_user_list cs JOIN user u on u.id = cs.user_id WHERE cs.club_id = #{club_id} AND cs.role = 'MASTER'

SELECT cs.user_id "cs_uid", cs.club_id "cs_cid", cs.role "cs_role", cs.regdate "cs_regdate", u.id "u_id", u.name "u_name", u.tel "u_tel", u.username "u_username", u.password "u_password", u.address "u_address", u.gender "u_gender", u.birthday "u_birthday", u.profile_picture "u_profile_picture", u.regdate "u_regdate" FROM club_user_list cs JOIN user u on u.id = cs.user_id WHERE cs.club_id = #{param1} order by cs_regdate asc

select cs.user_id "cs_uid", cs.club_id "cs_cid", cs.role "cs_role", c.id "c_id", c.name "c_name", c.category "c_category", c.detail_category "c_detail_category", c.intro "c_inrto", c.content "c_content", c.representative_picture "c_representative_picture", b.id "b_id", b.club_id "b_clubid", b.title "b_title", b.content "b_content", b.viewcnt "b_viewcnt", b.regdate "b_regdate", u.id "u_id", u.tel "u_tel", u.username "u_username", u.password "u_password", u.address "u_address", u.gender "u_gender", u.birthday "u_birthday", u.profile_picture "u_profile_picture", u.regdate "u_regdate", bt.id "bt_id", bt.name "bt_name" FROM CLUB_USER_LIST cs JOIN CLUB c ON cs.club_id = c.id JOIN User u ON cs.user_id = u.id JOIN BOARD b, BOARD_TYPE bt WHERE cs.club_id = c.id AND cs.user_id = u.id AND b.board_type_id = bt.id AND bt.id = 3 ;
